meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Blanca Gallardo Tom Gazzola Michael Shutterly Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #810.

td.p: Blanca Gallardo, a teacher from Syracuse, New York
Tom Gazzola, an assistant headmaster originally from North Mankato, Minnesota
Michael Shutterly, a bank officer from Elkridge, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,201)

tr.td: THE MISSISSIPPI
RELIGION
LAST LINES
RONALD REAGAN
PRISONS
PLUMBING
